message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire [product name]. I've assessed its value to be $1,750,000, but I'm willing to start negotiations at $1,600,000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and potential for your business. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,400,000 is significantly below the product's true value.  To bridge the gap, I'm willing to come down to $1,500,000. This price reflects a fair compromise and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement. I believe this is a great opportunity for you, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,450,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1,475,000 for the product.
